name: Therapeutic Supervised Visitations
description: Skilled AFS family therapists structure supportive, non-judgmental visits between parents and their children after the removal of a child due to abuse or neglect. Highly skilled AFS staff facilitate therapeutic sessions between biological parents and their child who is residing in foster care. These sessions are called, "Therapeutic Visitations."
